title: Delhi - NCR Weather Update : IMD issues heatwave alert for capital , temp to touch 45°C
body_text:
Delhi-NCR Weather Update: IMD issues heatwave alert for capital, temp to touch 45°C
Delhi is facing a heatwave with temperatures reaching the mid-40s this week, according to IMD. The city is also experiencing poor air quality and the GRAP sub-committee has directed authorities to take measures to control dust. The Ministry of Environment has reviewed the situation and taken necessary actions.
